br.com.caelum.vraptor.environment

Class ServletBasedEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.environment.DefaultEnvironment
      • br.com.caelum.vraptor.environment.ServletBasedEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Environment

    @ApplicationScoped
@Named(value="environment")
public class ServletBasedEnvironment
extends DefaultEnvironment
    A default Environment implementation which loads the environment file based on VRAPTOR_ENV system property or br.com.caelum.vraptor .environment property in the context init parameter.
    Author:
    Alexandre Atoji, Andrew Kurauchi, Guilherme Silveira, Rodrigo Turini
